title: She's Upset Her Fiancé Gave Her The Perfect Proposal?!
description:
Imagine walking to your favorite childhood spot with music in the background, twinkling lights hanging from the trees, and a beautiful picnic set for two. And then there he is...your boyfriend on bended knee. It's the perfect proposal!
But later, after the excitement settles, he tells you he hired a company to set up this perfect proposal. How do you feel? In this case, our listener is upset. But is she overreacting? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
